sqlMap.statement: SELECT DISTINCT ARIB.AR_BAT_RCPT_NM FROM AR_RCPT_INTFC_BAK ARIB WHERE ARIB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ARIB.AR_BAT_RCPT_NM LIKE #batRcptNm# AND ARIB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ARIB.AR_BAT_RCPT_NM DESC

SELECT I.INTERFACE_ID , I.TRANSACTION_ID , I.SEGMENT_ID , I.UNIT_ID , I.SEQ_NUMBER , I.AR_RCPT_INTFC_REC_TXT FROM NFCI1120_01 I WHERE I.INTERFACE_ID = #intfcId# AND I.TRANSACTION_ID = #tranId# ORDER BY I.SEGMENT_ID , I.UNIT_ID , I.SEQ_NUMBER
